org.netbeans.spi.editor.hints.settings

Interface FileHintPreferences.GlobalHintPreferencesProvider

  • Enclosing class:
    FileHintPreferences

    public static interface FileHintPreferences.GlobalHintPreferencesProvider
    Getter for global hints settings. Used as a fallback by FileHintPreferences.getFilePreferences(org.openide.filesystems.FileObject, java.lang.String), when there are no more specific settings for the files. To be registered in the MimeLookup for the given mime-type.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Preferences getGlobalPreferences()
      Return the global preferences for the given hint mime-type.

    • Method Detail

      • getGlobalPreferences

        Preferences getGlobalPreferences()
        Return the global preferences for the given hint mime-type.
        Returns:
        the global preferences for the given hint mime-type
